mi:PackageInformation.name: Orckestra.Search.WebsiteSearch
mi:PackageInformation.author: Orckestra A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Implements the search form and search results view as Razor functions. Does not include media files, data types and dynamic content in search results.
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Allows visitors search static content on a website by keywords.
